name: tm48
effect: Teaches Skill Swap to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Round to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Skill Swap Gen II: Fire Punch Gen I: Rock Slide)

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Switches abilities with the foe on the turn this is used.
flavor_text.emerald: Switches abilities with the foe on the turn this is used.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The user employs its psychic power to swap abilities with the foe.
